pred: Yes, bullfighting is dangerous for the bulls as well as the bullfighters. Bullfighting is a controversial sport that involves the killing of bulls in front of an audience. The bulls are subjected to extreme stress and fear as they are tormented by the bullfighters and their assistants. The bulls are often injured or killed during the process, and the bullfighters themselves are also at risk of injury. The practice of bullfighting has been criticized by animal rights activists and many people around the world for its cruelty and inhumane treatment of the animals.
